H&E.name: Hematoxylin and Eosin
H&E.description: Standard stain for visualizing nuclei and cytoplasm.

Gram Stain.name: Gram Stain
Gram Stain.description: Differentiates bacteria into Gram-positive and Gram-negative.

Masson's Trichrome.name: Masson's Trichrome Stain
Masson's Trichrome.description: Highlights collagen fibers in connective tissue.
